query:
SELECT
                        id,
                        args as "args: _",
                        created_at
                    FROM v2_job
                    WHERE workspace_id = $1
                      AND (
                            kind = 'unassigned_script'::JOB_KIND OR
                            kind = 'unassigned_flow'::JOB_KIND OR
                            kind = 'unassigned_singlestepflow'::JOB_KIND
                      )
                      AND trigger_kind = $2
                      AND trigger = $3
                      AND id = ANY($4)
